status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine is predominantly not operating, with 37 consecutive 10‑minute intervals in a Downtime state. Wind conditions are generally steady (mean 15.19 m/s, std 1.01) but include an isolated extreme gust (max 34.7 m/s), while power output is nearly flat (mean 0.9755, very low variability) alongside zero rotor speed variability and some generator speed variation. Operationally, the period is characterized by high-wind conditions coinciding with a persistent power deficit (negative power residual mean −0.0853) and elevated temperatures (mean 65.08).
